NAME.Nominative: Tuesday of the Sixth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Tuesday of the Sixth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 5<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: An invincible wall hast Thou given to our city, the Virgin who bore Thee; through her, O Savior, do Thou rescue our souls from the evils that surround us, we pray.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Help me, O Lord my God
and save me according to Thy mercy.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God, my praise do not pass over in silence.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Thou art a priest for ever,
SEXTE.STICHOS: The Lord said unto my Lord: Set Thou at my right hand.
